website_summaries.verdict: Great for bigger kids or bigger appetites, this thermos has a larger capacity than some others on the market, and is affordably priced.
pros: Vacuum insulated stainless steel construction does a great job of regulating temperature: food stays hot for 5 hours or cold for 10
Boasts a sleek and modern look that appeals to older kids
Comes in a variety of vibrant colors
Excellent quality for a reasonable price
cons: Can be difficult for smaller children to open

customer_reviews.title: It DOES keep food HOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Foogo Thermos containers for our kids to send them hot lunches and they NEVER kept good hot past an hour. I decided to give the MIRA food jar a try after reading good reviews. The day I got it, I put it to work. I put very hot water in the container for about 15 minutes. Then I put in hot oatmeal (only because I didn't care about throwing it out). After 5 hours the oatmeal was still over 100 degrees! This is far better than the thermos containers I have. I ordered another one. I will update once we use it more and see if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food hot for school!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for school since she is a picky eater. It definitely keeps her food hot until lunch time. The picture I have attached was raviolis that I made at 7:00 am and I checked to see how hot they would be at the time she would eat her lunch at school which is at 10:40 am. So 3 hours and 40 minutes later, the raviolis in the thermos read almost 150°. Definitely a great thermos!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Does not leak.  Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. My teenage daughter likes to take ramen to school for lunch on cold days and this does not leak at all. Incidentally, it is the perfect size to fit a whole package of ramen. I would say the size might be too small for a teenage boy or a man, but for my daughter and me, it is just right. Warning: When cleaning, be sure to put the sealing ring back on the correct way. If you put it on "upside-down," it forms such a tight seal that you have to pry it open. And yes, be sure you remove the sealing ring to clean the lid.
customer_reviews.author: sfbruin18

customer_reviews.title: It worked great! I bought it for my kids to use ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked great! I bought it for my kids to use for school lunch. I boiled water and put it in the thermoses and put the lids on while I was heating up their spaghetti. Then as soon as the spaghetti was warmed up, I took out the water and filled the thermos. They ate lunch about 4 1/2 to 5 hours later. I asked them if it was hot at lunch time and they both said "yes." My daughter said, "It was like magic." I am definitely glad I purchased these. It gives us more options for school lunch.
customer_reviews.author: M Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The top casing came off within 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Aarti Jesrani

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on hot foods
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my kids thermos for their lunches. I liked the color and reviews. However, this product does not work for hot items, which is what I purchased it for. It says keeps hot food for 6 hours-I tested it and it keep foods lukewarm for an hour, then cold/room temperature after that. I even pour boiling water into the thermos to heat it up but it still did not work. I can’t return it either.
customer_reviews.author: karissa

customer_reviews.title: This jar leaks
customer_reviews.text: Liked the description and wanted a bit larger jar than the thermos I usually get for kids lunch. Decided to go with MIRA based on the description. Kids liked the color. However, this jar totally useless because it leaks. All of us take turns in closing it just to see if one person is doing it wrong, but it still leaks every single time. We use thermos for soup a lot so the leak is obvious, maybe if it's used just for dry food, it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: K Giertl

customer_reviews.title: Hot lunches at last!
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the directions and pre-heat with hot water for about five minutes, it works like a dream. Lunches packed at 7:30 am are hot at 12:30 pm, and the food actually still feels warm when the kids get home from school. Never leaks in spite of my kids being less than gentle with their lunch boxes. Easy to clean, no sealing ring to absorb odors and colors...love it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had this for 2 weeks and it’s not broken because the lid couldn’t be twisted off anymore. There is also smell left behind even after I wash it of several times.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Rust along interior seam
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked really well to keep my food warm. I’ve used it daily for a month. However, I’ve noticed rust developing along the seam on the interior. At first, I thought it was stuck on food, but after repeated cleaning and scraping and closer inspection I’m noticing that it’s RUST. I have a Thermos brand container and have never had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: hornet6499

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The colors are nice and food did stay warm, but not warm enough. After a week of use, surprised to see a yellow staining on top of the lid and also on the bottom of container. Bought 2 of them and both had similar yellow stains. Tried to get it off but to no avail. Don't even know where the stains come from. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: We have three of these that our kids use for their school lunches. They report that they keep the food plenty warm. I like to put boiling water in the container while I heat up their food. Then I dump out that water and put the hot food in. We haven't used it to keep things cold except for once. My daughter put frozen berries and refrigerated yogurt in hers. She said it was like almost like frozen yogurt at lunchtime.
customer_reviews.author: SATM

customer_reviews.title: Purchasing more soon- Kept hot for 15 hours!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I purchased this for lunch to take soups in. Yesterday I used the container and prepped my soup at 8 am. I wasn't able to get to my lunch until 11pm... it was STILL WARM. Not scalding but hot enough that I didn't need to microwave it. The trick is to prime the container with boiling water while you are warming the dish to go in it... and make the dish slightly hotter than you normally would to eat it. Easy to clean, no leaks or spills, true to color, has not faded in 4 months of regular use. <3 Definitely recommend and will be buying more as gifts for the coming holidays.
customer_reviews.author: NMLuvs2Dance

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little thermos. It does keep my daughters lunch hot or cold, depending. It holds a can of soup. My only complaint is that the top is broken. When you try to open or close it by grabbing the top, it just spins. You have to grab the black piece around the lip in order to open or close it, which is difficult for my daughter. We've only had this a few months, so I expected a little better quality. Overall, I guess it does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: GE525

customer_reviews.title: Keeps piping hot for 9+ hrs!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, We have had this thing for a little over a year and it has always worked great. But today’s performance made me feel like I really needed to write a review. Preheated this and added hot spaghetti-Os this morning at 7am. Picked up my first grader which told me she wasn’t able to eat it because they got called for recess early (idk what that really means) So I was thinking it was wasted. Got home and at 4:45pm opened to clean out and it was still steaming!!
customer_reviews.author: tlawson

customer_reviews.title: Works too well (almost :-))
customer_reviews.text: We had been using an old thermos for years. My daughter complained the first day I put the new MIRA thermos in her lunch. She said the food was still so steaming hot that she ran out of time waiting for it to cool. I had pre-heated the inside with boiling water that first day so the 2nd day, I eliminated that step and just put the hot food directly in. She came back with only 1/4 eaten - complaining of the same thing. When I unpacked the lunchbox 8 hours later it was still warm! So, YES! This thermos works well! Almost too well!
customer_reviews.author: Gringa Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: good size for my kids
customer_reviews.text: Pros - wide mouth, good size for my kids, easy to open and great colors. Cons - lid is hard to clean (there's a very narrow channel where lid screws onto bases that is impossible to do anything but rinse out). If you aren't meticulous about scrubbing & rinsing the outside, the grippy material covering the jar (which works great for helping small hands open the jar) attracts grease and the grippiness quickly becomes grubbiness! This is if you're hand washing it in a sink with other items - it is not recommended for the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Bexster08

customer_reviews.title: Good Size + Good Price - NOT Dishwasher Safe!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with the color teal this year. Her backpack and lunchbox are teal and this thermos matches perfectly! She wants to start bringing more home lunches to school. Purchased this one based on size, price, and reviews. LOVE that we could personalize it with her name as she has a unique spelling. The optional image embellishment is cute. She picked the unicorn. I was worried it the print & image would be small based on how the preview generated, but both were much bigger than expected and more proportionate to the thermos. Excellent purchase & very pleased with product so far!
customer_reviews.author: Karianne

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Placed sizzling hot fries right out of the oven inside of an already scolding hot cup and wrapped the fries in paper towel. Come back after an 1 hour 30 mins and it was room temperature. There is nothing special about this cup! Make soup would have stayed a little hotter a little longer but I bought this for me 3 year old to take to school, but after testing it out today I will have to find a different product. Waste of time and money! Oh and cleaning the oil that is stuck to the cup is also a head ache due to the finish on the inside!
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: 5" tall, but perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior cat who is eating those squeeze food tubes. It is bone chillingly cold in our apartment and when he wants to eat I really was not happy feeding him very cold food, mainly because anything can trigger his asthma or upset his stomach. So I was running every tube under hot water. This small MIRA food jar is an inch short of perfection, but the fact that I can fill it with hot water, add in his food tubes and not worry about running to warm up every tube, is wonderful! Highly recommended if this is a need you might have as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.58

customer_reviews.title: Game changer...no more peanut butter and jelly on the regular!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to expand my son's lunch options at school. As with a lot of kids, mac n' cheese is a winner in our household. I sent him to school with some MnC and not only did it stay warm, he LOVED having something other than PB&J for lunch. It was easy to hand wash, has a nice texture on the outside so it's slip proof and stores easily. It was slightly larger than I anticipated but as my son grows, so will the size of his portions. Win Win!
customer_reviews.author: BT'sMama

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good, the heat preservation effect is satisfactory!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good, the heat preservation effect is satisfactory!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sending hot lunches to school!
customer_reviews.text: This container is perfect for sending hot lunches too school! It's just the right size! I've sent pasta, meatballs, pizza rolls, soup, and more! I use my keurig to fill it with hot water for about 5 min, then pour out the water and fill with hot food. My kids tell me the food is still hot by lunchtime!
customer_reviews.author: Jorsta

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep food warm
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work!! Followed directions exactly and my 4th grader says the food is not warm at all by lunch time (3 hours from preparation) What a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I’m a believer! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these jars! They are the perfect size for kids. They keep our food hot for hours. It’s small enough to keep in your purse/diaper bag and they are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Mom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep food hot
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful little thermos, I love the color and shape and even the name. But the primary reason one buys a thermos is to keep food HOT. I kept thinking my daughter was just complaining or wasn't heating her food up hot enough on the mornings before school, But then I tried it myself and 3 hours later, the food is lukewarm. I wish I would have paid attention earlier to what she was saying, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabot Lu

customer_reviews.title: Don't screw it too tight!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loves this thermos, which replaced her disney one from when she was 5! I love the color options and it's sleek look. It's larger too than our other so it holds more.We did have one day where it was screwed a little too tight and she had trouble opening it on her own but we haven't had the problems some people report about that. The lid is easy enough to clean but if it does start to get moldy like other of those types of containers you won't be able to see it because the rubber liner is black. Good or bad? You decide!!
customer_reviews.author: Camp Airy & Louise Foundation, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Keep hot food barely warm after just 2 hours. Not worth it al all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Once a week I go to a meeting. I do not have time to eat Breakfast b4 I go. So, I take my oatmeal with me. You need to put hot water in it to warm up the inside of the thermos, no Problem. I then make my oatmeat on the warmer side. It was juat a great temp once I was at the meeting. It was warmer that I thought it would be. It was just the right size to hold all my bowl of oatmeal. I am very pleased with my purchase. I plan to tell my friends & family about my new find.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Lover

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food hot but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The Mira does a good job keeping the contents hot, but I have 2 problems with it. One is the narrow opening, the kids hate it when I pack things that are hard to get out. The other is my main complaint - it's impossible to clean the cover. Food and grease get trapped in the super narrow neck. I tried soaking the cover in boiling water but there's no way of actually getting in there.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little thermos (food jar).. I was skeptical if this would really keep my food hot hours later... Well it does...I boiled my soup at 8:30 am ( run hot water in the thermos first, empty it. Put food in) By 2:30pm when I opened it, it was steaming. The top layer was still warm but when I put my spoon further down it was hot! Awesome. What little remainder of lunch I had leftover was still warm by 7pm. I highly recommend this. 10 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Really like the color and feel of this canister
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit bigger than we expected, but keeps things warm and has a longer, slender shape that makes it easier to hold in my 10 year old's hand. Really like the color and feel of this canister.
customer_reviews.author: heidi yamada

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16 year old daughter to take to school with her. I wanted to get her a hydroflask but found ALL of them to be (imho) unreasonable priced. This little food jar is so cute, inexpensive and seems to be very well made. If I weren't a stay at home mom, I would buy one for myself! It seems like a good size, she hasn't used it yet but will most likely use it for hot foods rather than cold. Very nice, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: VanessaF

customer_reviews.title: It met all my requirements!
customer_reviews.text: I had started a new job and needed a more adult Thermos container over my old Hello Kitty one and this fit the bill. Size is perfect for soup, keeps my food hot until lunchtime, doesn't leak and still looks cute. It checked all those boxes for me. The only thing is eventually it does pick up some flavors from your food (for example i bring chicken soup in this).. but a quick soak in a solution of vinegar and water takes it right out. I'm actually going to buy another one, use the current one for savory dishes and the new one for my oatmeal or sweeter dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Carmie

customer_reviews.title: Great for school lunch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids school lunch to hold chicken nuggets or pizza rolls so they could have a hot meal as they were very tired of sandwich’s. This works well they eat about 5 hours after I put the food in the thermos and both of my kids say the food is still hot. A good bonus is the nice color choice and style of the thermos. This also fits in the lunchbox very well.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Favorite thermos for my kids lunch
customer_reviews.text: I bought two different brand thermoses for my kids to try out for school lunches. This one is our favorite since the butter in the other container leaks where as this Mira brand does not leak any fluid I put in the themos. My first grader doesn’t have any problems opening it. I would love a dishwasher safe version but otherwise we love this thermos and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: K.W

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous thermos/food jar!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little thermos! Perfect size. Kept my Daughters bone broth hot from 8AM until lunchtime with no problem (I did put boiling water in the thermos for a couple minutes to warm it before using it for broth storage). In fact, she said it was too hot at lunchtime, and at 5PM, it was STILL warm...wow! Plus, I put it in her lunchbox next to cold packs that were keeping other items cold. No issues whatsoever. And, my Daughter could open and close it by herself (she's 7) without difficulty. She loves it!😊 So do I! We haven't used it thus far to store anything cold. I would highly recommend this little jar/thermos!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Betzler

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifts and daily use
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I each have one of these. We actually do not use them as food containers. But rather, as cups for drinks. They are great for shaking cold mixed drinks and transporting hot coffee. A few cautions to note: The lid holds liquid. Open at an angle over the cup to avoid drips. It will hold carbonated drinks. However, open the lid slowly. The pressure may blow the lid off.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not keeping food warm at all!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed product! Not keeping food warm at all! My kids have been using Thermos food jars for more than 10 years, they all did great job. Recently my kid broke the lids, I had to buy a new one. Since Mila"s jar look very nice, reviews looked good too, so I gave it a try. However, after first use, my kid complained that the food were not warm at all. At first, I didn't believe it, so the next time I heated the food even hotter before I put in the jar. It didn't work, the food still cool down very soon. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: keyang xu

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Christmas gifts for my college student/young adult daughters. They are the best! Used for coffee, soups and hot tea. The food and drinks stayed hot for hours (with the lids on). Also used for cold items like smoothies and ice water. Went to bed one night with the thermos on my side table with ice water. When I woke up, there was still ice! You can get your hand all the way down in there to clean which is very nice. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie C.

customer_reviews.title: Won't keep anything hot
customer_reviews.text: On 2 separate occasions I sent my daughter pasta in her lunch. Both times pasta was cold by 12:00 p.m. I preheated the thermos with hot water for 5 minutes I also made the pasta extra hot in the microwave and it still was lukewarm at best
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food hot!
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my kids' lunches. Works great! Warm up with hot water for 10-15 min, then transfer food in. Pack lunch around 7 and it's still hot/warm at 11:30. Be careful not to screw on too tight, then there is a vacuum effect and it is very hard to unscrew when hot food is inside. No leaks, even with soup. Fits inside a typical lunch tote. I put the lid on the window sill between uses so the UV can keep mildew away from the crevasses that are hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Patel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my husband to bring to work with him as he is never near a microwave. We got it and realized it was a little smaller than we thought but tried to make it work. I packed soup for lunch and got a call at lunch time that the seal had leaked all over his lunch. We realized that you really are not able to fill with soup to the top, which makes an already small container even smaller. But it will be perfect to put in a little kids lunch for the smaller portions as long as it is able to be kept upright!
customer_reviews.author: Kira Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Holds temp really well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves soup and takes it for school lunch many times per week. She says the soup is almost too hot to eat at lunch time. We were using a small Thermos brand but this holds temp so much better and holds a little more volume. It seems really durable. Others have complained about cleaning the lid. It's no harder than the lid on the Thermos brand. Both have a rubber gasket that you have to peel back and rinse out as it can trap some food in it.
customer_reviews.author: lgr

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a day
customer_reviews.text: Item worked great first day. We hand washed it and refilled for the next day. Next day comes, a new dinging sound is now coming from inside of can. I believe something broke internally as now it only keeps items hot for half as long.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value!
customer_reviews.text: This thermos is perfect for sending to daycare with my little boy. They aren't able to microwave food in his classroom, so this opens up all sorts of options of food for us to send with him instead of just sandwiches and things of that nature.
customer_reviews.author: KMarie1705

customer_reviews.title: Defective Thermos
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has to ask teachers to open it for her and they have a hard time opening it. I did not believe it was a problem until one day I had lunch with her and the thermos did not open. It kept making popping sounds and would not open. I have to buy her a new one. It might be a defective thermos. I am not pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Monge

customer_reviews.title: Best one I have used yet for my kids school lunch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I have bought a few different brands of these to keep my child's lunch warm and so far nothing has worked and my kids mac n cheese is usually hardened over in the 4 hrs he has from home to lunch. This one however held its temperature for at least 6 hrs before the food was cool. It also kept my daughters milk cool for an entire day. I highly recommend. The outside scratches easy, but I can careless, I bought it with intentions of it getting used and abused anyway. It also fits in my kids lunch box !
customer_reviews.author: VeeJay Stankiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Stays hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: I like to put hot water in here for later use to make tea or for instant oatmeal while at work. The only thing I don’t like is that it sometimes pops. There were instructions included with the thermos that said to not close too tight and I don’t but it still manages to pop at times when I open it so because of that I’m always a little uneasy when it comes to opening it. It’s still a good product and I will keep using it. My hot water will stay hot for hours!!!
customer_reviews.author: Broc Oppler

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food warm, but not hot.
customer_reviews.text: I used mine for lunch today. I filled the jar with hot water this morning as I prepped the soup, as instructed. Once the soup was boiling, I emptied the water and poured the soup in the jar. Sealed it immediately. 4 hours later, I opened it for lunch at my desk. The soup was still warm, but definitely not hot. I think going forward, I'll only use this jar if I plan to eat the contents within two hours.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: This thermos is an investment in my retirement plan! I kid....but only sorta
customer_reviews.text: I was in a toddler lunch packing rut and turned to this for inspiration......soups, noodles, chilly, dumplings. Just saw the movie “crazy rich Asians” and the line : “parents in America make their kids Mac and cheese and then wonder why their kids put them in nursing homes” really inspired me to do better !
customer_reviews.author: Aria Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far, we are elated with this product. It keeps food very warm. I ask my kids how well it heats their food and their response is always “very well!” So for picky eaters, there ya have it. I was a little disappointed that one of the jars dropped from my 4 year old’s hands. The kid was slightly dented afterwards. They are made from metal so I guess I am not shocked. I just hope it doesn’t become a problem as my four children will be handling these almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Cute color & durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these food jars for my teens. They love being able to take warm foods for lunch b/c the lines are too long to wait for microwaves during their lunch break. We follow the advice of others and pour warm water inside for a few minutes, then dump, then put in warm food. These are fabulous - would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: K Roz

customer_reviews.title: Keeps lunch hot!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my daughter can take her lunch to school because last year she complained about her lunch being cold. So far it’s good. She’s said her lunch had been warm and delicious. She’s loving it. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JoLo

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep solid food hot!
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep solid food hot! I have tested at 3 hours and 4 hours. In both cases, food was cold. These tests include following directions to heat interior with hot water, then add hot food. Manufacturer claims up to 5 hours, I suspect its more like 2 hours. Perhaps it works with tea and coffee, but this is sold as a food jar, not a thermos for liquid.
customer_reviews.author: M. L.

customer_reviews.title: Love my lunch thermos
customer_reviews.text: I work in an office and have many virtual/ phone meetings and sometimes even during lunch; which means I don't get to leave my desk to grab lunch. I was sick of cold sandwiches, so ordered this thermos. I LOVE IT. I heat up soup or leftovers in the am before I go to work, put in the thermos, leave it at my desk and at lunch it is still warm and delicious! It's definitely saved me from being 'hangry' at work.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.

customer_reviews.title: Feel apart right away
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this thermos but within a couple of weeks, the top came apart and now it leaks. Cannot be used and it's past my window to return it to Amazon. Super disappointing especially because it was an expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Didn't keep it HOT, just warm.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because reviews were saying it kept food hot for hours. For myself it just kept it warm after a couple of hours. I normally warm up my food to be smolderingly hot at 9am, I go to my first class, I pull out my food at 11:50 am, a 3 hour gap and my food is then only just warm. I am disappointed to say the least, but it beats the 20 minute microwave lines at school. I would say fork out an extra 10-20 bucks and get a trusted brand like stanley though.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: This is the one! Just swipe buy now
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and just the right size. It retains heat very good as well, Kid uses it for school lunches and says that the contents are always hot when it’s opened. So far it’s standing up against the travel to and from school too. No issues with vapor lock of the top either which is the biggest plus!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Doug

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered had something rolling around in it. I sent it back and then ordered a second food jar. Both are working well. The 13.5 oz size is perfect for my son's lunchbox. I ordered the larger size and it was huge, so it had to go back. Overall, love the color choices and they are working well. I would recommend these food jars.
customer_reviews.author: klove4u

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Packaged
customer_reviews.text: Received damaged (dented), unboxed, and poorly packaged. Have already returned in exact same packaging that I received them in....FYI - Did reorder because i do love the Mira line. Have many pieces that came thru to me, just fine
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle65

customer_reviews.title: Good thermos containers!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Outside can get slightly stained/look dirty but hasn’t been anything too bad. It’s because of the material on the outside. But my kids like it for their lunch and it keeps food warm so that’s a plus. Better price than the thermos brand and slightly larger!
customer_reviews.author: Ebiel and Erica Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: These thermal is so sturdy and it keeps the food hot for many hours. I use these for my kids lunches, and I warm up the food at 7:30am and they eat at 12pm and the food is still hot. I love it! I use it for pastas, chicken nuggets, meatballs, etc. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Stays hot!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter leaves for school at 6:30am and when she gets home at 5:30pm from practice anything left in here will still be very warm. She says at lunch its piping hot still. Though she's 16 she is still pretty rough on things and this has lived up to her drops and bangs like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We used this product three times. Each time we used it we hand washed as soon as our daughter got home from school. We only used plastic utensils to eat out of it. Within three uses, the stainless steel inside began to pit and rust.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Good thermos.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has only used the thermos once so far, but we’re very pleased with it as of now. It did keep her lunch warm for over 4 hours between going to school and lunchtime. I put it on the to rack of my dishwasher and it cleaned up well. Hopefully it will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old to bring warm lunch to school . She loves this!! Her food stays nice and hot for school lunch & it’s super easy for her to open on her own . She’s obsessed with the choice of colors available as well. Overall this was a great purchase we’ve had no issues and cleaning it is easy the color hasn’t worn off and she’s been using regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Stay's hot.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It works great and keeps food or liquid warm for well over 8 hours. We tested it when we got it home and put different things in there and left them over night. In the morning they were still warm. Perfect for you to take to work or we have our kids take it to school when they want something warm for lunches.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: SOUP STILL WARM AFTER 9 HOURS!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start by saying that thisbis the first thermos I’ve ever owned. I don’t camp and don’t really like soup so I never needed one. My son started school this year and loves soup. I decided to try this out bc the price was good and it looks small enough to fit in his lunchbox. THE SOUP WAS STILL HOT AT 5pm!!!!! I almost died of shock. I begged my nanny, sister and husband to feel the remaining soup and be shocked like me. What a great product and not one leak! Buy it. You won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: A convenient way to pack a warm lunch
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and I've used the jar several times in my son's school lunch since it arrived. Easy to prep the food and it stays warm through lunch, which is about 5 hours since I pack it. Easy to clean (I hand wash with warm soapy water), holds a perfect size serving for my 11 year old, and the colors are great. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: Do not put this product in a dish washer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March and I barely used it. I didn't know this product is hand wash only. I first put it in the steamer and realized it got discolored. Then I put it in the dishwasher and that totally destroyed it! Over the years I owned many thermos and I put them in the dishwasher with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kyoko Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home lunch!
customer_reviews.text: I drive a lot for work and the options for me is fast food, or a cold lunch every day. It gets old fast. I bought this container and it is exactly what I wanted! It kept my food warm and it holds the perfect amount of food. I recommend buying longer utensils to use with this though. When I tried using plastic utensils, they were too short to reach to the bottom and trying to get food out made my fingers get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but seemed good
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on a recommendation, it looks great and well built but the primary function of this product is not perfect. It doesn't keep the food warm as much as I expect it from it. My 5 year old kid takes her lunch in the same and it is barely lukewarm in the container in less than 4 hours after packing it so not very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: GinDrake

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t insulate
customer_reviews.text: Can honestly say that I would not buy the product again. Each morning I throw in steaming hot food, but by the time I sit down to eat, my food isn’t even lukewarm. I pack my lunches between 7:30:8:00, and I sit down to eat lunch at 11:30. Other than the lack of doing what it claimed, it’s a nice jar and is super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Blair

customer_reviews.title: Good product  not for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: The tumbler is good. Kept my daughters lunch warm from when I put it in at 730 until she got home at 330 bad news is it is top hard for kids to open so unless your kid has a teacher that will open it for them I say wait until kid is stronger my daughter is 6. The lid is hard to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Justanotherperson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great little hot container for my 4th grader! Keeps her soups etc hot until lunch. I usually have her out the door at 7:30 am and lunch is at 12:15. She is so excited to have more variety in her lunches. As far as the cleaning goes, it's not too bad. We just hske our tiny stainless straw cleaners and run it around the inside of the lid. Cleans easy and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds the heat.
customer_reviews.text: This thermos works great! It is pretty large too! I like to put hot water in it first and let it sit for about 5 minutes before putting in my hot meal, just so the heat is contained well. So far, so good. Bought one for me and one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and my son who is very sensory seeking loves the "soft" feel of this canister. The reason I give it four stars is because the color is WAY off! The picture I see on both my computer and phone is a vibrant almost electric green if you will. But the actual product is more of a pea green. Other than that small set back, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL JAR but it's hard to open and clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright green color food jar. It came in a cardboard box but my jar had a little dimple dent in the front. Tiny blemish. The jar did keep food hot 3 hours later when I had my chicken and rice. However, the top is way to hard to open. Also, trying to clean the underside of the top is hard. You have to use a small tiny brush to get into the crevices. The mouth of the jar is a little small too. While the exterior looks great, you see greasy fingerprints on it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Seller

customer_reviews.title: Nice food jar.
customer_reviews.text: I like this well enough but found that it doesn't keep the hot food at the same temperature after only 4 hours. It is very user friendly with the wide mouth. I would suggest heating your soup or food a little hotter than you would want it to be so it will be the right temperature when you eat it. It does really well with cold foods.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Works well but occasionally leaks
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos love these. We use them for school lunches and it keeps stuff nice and warm. We use them to keep soup, hot dogs or chicken nuggets warm. Sometimes it seems like it is hard to correctly screw the lid on. Like the threads feel off or something. (For this reason I send it to school in a gallon size Ziploc just in case.) It does ever so slightly leak at times. Cleaning is easy with soap and water and a bottle brush. Then it air dries and is ready for use again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie V

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This keeps food super hot for so long. I would pack my lunch around 9 am, but sometimes I dont get a chance to eat lunch and so I would eat at home around 5 pm and the food is still hot! I got the teal color and I would advise against the light colors as they get stained. My only other issue is that if you don't put the rubber band in the right side, it creates a vacuum seal and is hard to open the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Tevy

customer_reviews.title: Great little thermos
customer_reviews.text: Bit enough to hold enough food for my high schooler for lunch, keeps his hot food hot, and the wide mouth is easy to eat from. Small enough to fit into the stretchy outside pocket of his backback like a fat water bottle. Sturdy. Overall a very nice purchase which will allow him to expand his repertoire of lunch choices.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking,  but impossible to get lid off with hot contents
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and durable. 3 stars because almost impossible to get top off when it had hot liquids in it. My daughter had to have 3 teachers try before they could get it off for her soup lunch.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: A good one
customer_reviews.text: Tested this out with hot water from the cooler. After about 5 hours it was still hot. After 12 hours it was still fairly warm. 24 hours later it was tepid warm. I am completely satisfied and will be ordering a second one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not keep food warm, not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color and reviews. I bought this to replace my kid thermos for her lunches. I believe it will keep food warm for 6 hrs, however, it doesn't work as it is described. Also, it is not easy to clean. Even though i use the detergent, it is still greasy inside.
customer_reviews.author: flyingspongebob

customer_reviews.title: Impressive - Keeps Hot for Hours!
customer_reviews.text: I used this thermos for lunch at work. From the time I heated up my soup to eating it, about 6 hours would pass and the soup would still be piping hot! Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Desiree of Filloria

customer_reviews.title: Overall good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It keeps food warm but not hot. The bottom piece is easy to clean, however the top piece I was not able to get it completely clean by hand washing. I did put the top in the dish washer and it still works well. The bottom I hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Keanna

customer_reviews.title: Lid keeps popping back in when trying to open. Returning it with my food still in side.
customer_reviews.text: Used twice. On 3rd use the top would not open. I twisted to open but the lud kept on popping back in. Yes it is leak proof and did keep my food hot and loved the pink color. Too bad! Returning with contents of my home made soup inside.
customer_reviews.author: RLR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the lunchbox!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things! They are leakproof, easy to clean, and super cute! I keep my daughters food nice and warm throughout the morning up until lunch. It’s perfect for her lunchbox
customer_reviews.author: LID0409

customer_reviews.title: School lunch approved!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our kids school lunches. We put boiling water in it for 10 mins and heat the food we put in it. They say the food stays hot when they eat lunch. We put it in there at about 7:15am and they eat between 11:30-12pm. We have done pasta, enchiladas, and chicken nuggets.
customer_reviews.author: Keyla Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Keep food warm but stain easily..
customer_reviews.text: I used once so far for my daughter's lunch and she said food was still warm during lunch time. But, I noticed that it left stain on outside - maybe from food? It couldn't have been on there for more than several hours so I hoped to get it off - I tried and tried but couldn't get it off... :( I like soft feel of outer layer but I can see potential (and I'm already seeing) of stain and damage easily. Any suggestion of how to get stain out?
customer_reviews.author: Popo

customer_reviews.title: Modern, attractive thermos
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this thermos yet so I can’t comment on how long it keeps soup hot- sorry. It is attractive and compact so it will be easy to take along when going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Dinky

customer_reviews.title: Durable lunch thermos
customer_reviews.text: Keeps lunch hot for my daughter at school. Packing leftover dinner- she warms it before she leaves for class and it’s still warm for lunch. She loves it. Lid is a little hard to clean- we use a bottle brush. But still very happy
customer_reviews.author: M&A

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous thermos!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermos. Purchased for my granddaughters school lunches. Easily fits into many different lunchboxes and is completely leak proof. She has taken everything from soup to pizza rolls and the food stays hot and doesnt spill. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lineback

customer_reviews.title: Good value - does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is perfectly nice little container. I pre-heat with boiling water prior to sending it off with my daughter and it's still hot at lunchtime, and even warm enough to eat by the time she comes home at the end of the day. It's taken a few dings from being transported to/from school, but I haven't had any problems with leaking. Easy to clean with a bottle brush and no issues with staining or smells lingering.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Keeps stuff hot
customer_reviews.text: I have about an hour commute to work and I cook breakfast to eat at work and pack it in this thermos and it is still hot when I finally open it to eat. So in all it's about 2-3 hours before I open it up again to eat my breakfast and it is still hot.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel M. Marin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Food Jar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this food jar for my oatmeal that I take to work every morning. I eat my oatmeal about 2 hours after getting to work. By the time I would eat it using my old container, it was barely warm. With my new Mira Lunch Food Jar, it tasted like I had just made it. It keeps my oatmeal very warm. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pet Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermos
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It keeps food warm from 7 am until 1pm, haven't had the need to test past then :) Love the color choices. The wide mouth makes it easy to eat from, and clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: kristen macy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the purple thermos a few months ago and it has been working very well. It keeps food warm for long time periods; once it stayed warm from 7 AM to 3 PM, 8 hours! Although, remember to not close it too tight or it may be difficult to open. It's also very easy to wash with soap and water. This thermos definitely exceeded my expectations and if I had to buy it again, I absolutely would.
customer_reviews.author: suma koshy

product_meta.title: MIRA Lunch, Food Jar - Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Lunch Thermos - 13.5 oz - Sky
feature_bullets: Perfectly Portable: Our thermos food jar is large enough to fit an entire meal yet small enough to fit in kids lunch boxes and adult lunch bags. Confidently pack your sweat-proof and leak-proof food jar in your bag or backpack without worrying about spills or leaks. Take your food thermos to school, work or travel without needing to reheat or refrigerate your food.

Innovative Vacuum Insulation: Keep your food cold for 10 hours or hot for 5 hours with our highly rated insulated food jar. Our thermos lunch box uses our innovative MiraGuard Technology to maintain temperatures for hours. Explore new meal possibilities with your food thermos for hot food and cold food.

Built to Last: Constructed from durable 18/8 food-grade stainless steel that won’t rust, break, retain or transfer flavors. Comfortably hold your hot food thermos in your hand as our thermoses have a matte finish that feels soft to the touch and provides a slip-free grip. The easy to twist lid makes this jar the best kids thermos for hot food.

Functional Style: This versatile lunch thermos is great for toddlers, kids and adults. Use your thermos food containers for hot foods such as pasta, soup or chili. The wide mouth of this modern lunch jar makes filling and cleaning the jar a simple task.

Health in Mind: With our insulated food flask, you can skip on eating outside food and pack a healthy, homemade meal instead. Pack hearty oatmeal for breakfast, hot soup for lunch or fresh fruit for a snack in between meals. With your safety also in mind, our reusable thermos food containers for hot food are BPA-free. Food jar is hand-wash only. NOTE: Please do not overfill the jar or store food in the lunch jar for more than 24 hours. Please do not over-tighten the lid and do not force it open.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,869 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
